textBeforeTable: CategoryContainer.map  protected Map<CategoryPath,CategoryAttribute> Field and Description Modifier and Type   Fields in org.apache.lucene.facet.index with type parameters of type CategoryPath Uses of CategoryPath in org.apache.lucene.facet.index An LRU cache implementation for the CategoryPath to Ordinal map org.apache.lucene.facet.taxonomy.writercache.lru Category->Ordinal caching implementation using an optimized data-structures The internal map data structure consumes less memory (~30%) and is faster (~50%) compared to a Java HashMap<String, Integer>. org.apache.lucene.facet.taxonomy.writercache.cl2o Improves indexing time by caching a map of CategoryPath to their Ordinal org.apache.lucene.facet.taxonomy.writercache Taxonomy implemented using a Lucene-Index org.apache.lucene.facet.taxonomy.directory For example, in a book store application, a Taxonomy could have the following hierarchy: Author Mark Twain J. Taxonomy Taxonomy of Categories Facets are defined using a hierarchy of categories, known as a org.apache.lucene.facet.taxonomy Results of Faceted Search
